title: Relaxations for the free sale component – Relaxation contained in sub-regulation No
clause_text: Relaxations for the free sale component – Relaxation contained in sub-regulation No.6.6, 6.7, 6.11, 6.12, 6.13 above, other necessary relaxation shall be given to the free sale components for deficient area on payment of premium at the 2.5% rate of ASR for open land (for FSI 1)or 10% of normal premium whichever is more.
section: RELAXATION IN BUILDING AND OTHER REQUIREMENTS:
